DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Assess Genotypes/Phenotypes Correlations Type-2 Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim characterize type 2 diabetic patient initial alteration diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) base three different phenotype previously identify different pattern progression [ Lobo , 2004 ] order correlate data genetic information ( base list candidate gene previously identify involve DR ) . The result study use exclusively scientific purpose .
DOC.criteria: Type2 diabetic subject form PTDC/SAUOSM/72635/2006 clinical trial ( early stage nonproliferative retinopathy level 30 35 ETDRS ; . female male ; age 18 year ) sign Informed Consent study . Cataract eye disease may interfere fundus examination ; Vitreous syneresis posterior vitreous detachment ; Dilatation pupil < 5 mm .
